suggestedStrategies.name: AddAccessibility
suggestedStrategies.description: Enhance the prompt with explicit accessibility requirements including ARIA labels, keyboard navigation patterns, and focus management
suggestedStrategies.rationale: The component scored only 1/5 on accessibility, making it the most critical area for improvement

suggestedStrategies.name: AddUXGuidelines
suggestedStrategies.description: Add detailed UX guidelines including loading states, validation feedback, and responsive behavior expectations
suggestedStrategies.rationale: The component needs more polish in user experience, particularly around form interaction patterns

suggestedStrategies.name: AddExamples
suggestedStrategies.description: Add concrete examples of expected form layouts, validation patterns, and error handling
suggestedStrategies.rationale: Providing examples will help improve fidelity and innovation in implementation

suggestedStrategies.name: IncreaseCreativity
suggestedStrategies.description: Encourage more creative and innovative approaches with examples of unique hero sections
suggestedStrategies.rationale: Innovation scored lowest at 1/5, showing need for more creative direction

suggestedStrategies.name: AddAccessibility
suggestedStrategies.description: Add specific accessibility requirements for hero sections, including semantic markup and screen reader support
suggestedStrategies.rationale: Accessibility scored 2/5 and needs significant improvement

suggestedStrategies.name: EnhanceWithVisualDesign
suggestedStrategies.description: Provide more detailed visual design direction including animation specifications, transitions, and micro-interactions
suggestedStrategies.rationale: UX Polish scored 2/5 and would benefit from more specific design guidance
